Text: TW Business Objects Report Cc I wanted to let you know that I sent you the TW Daily Balance report in Business Objects this afternoon When you get a chance will you retrieve it and try to refresh it please It may take a couple of minutes to refresh so dont worry if it seems to be taking a long time By having the report yourself we can start working on automating your imbalance monitoring process or at the very least we may be able to come up with a way to make the estimated imbalance on the report more accurate as Tracy and Dan requested Let me know how it goes Thanks Ken Powers

FW Out of OfficeKen Powers Original Message From Powers Ken Sent Tuesday October AM To Bianchi Rita Dasilva Esther Wiltfong Jim Bolks Sean Bollinger Joni Penkava Loren Cohrs Allen Fiscus John Gilbert Steve Jones Dana Joyce Jane Korbelik Stephanie Powell Don Subject Out of Office I will be out of the office for a Business Objects conference Monday through Wednesday I will be back in the office Thursday Ken Powers

ThanksI wanted to let you know how thankful I am for the help I received from the TW scheduling group over the past couple of months as Ive workedand struggledon the TW Daily Balancing Report I have made repeated phone calls to Houston and have always received prompt and courteous attention from the group as Ive tried to understand TMS and TWs systems and scheduling peculiarities I have worked with Amy Mulligan Cynthia Rivers Linda Ward Christine McEvoy and Bert Hernandez In particular I felt impelled to let you know that Bert Hernandez has been especially helpful in my endeavours Bert and I spent many hours on the phone discussing TWs scheduling intricacies He has been very patient with me and always made himself available to me to answer my questions He was able to discuss in great detail many TW transactions including why and how transactions appear the way they do and what the transactional data means He even went so far as to ask other departments for explanations as questions arose rather than referring me to someone else and never failed to followup on a question I had In short I could not have made the progress I have without Berts help The report is still being finalized but Marketing and Gas Control have already employed the report with great success in managing Transwestern pipeline activities Incremental gas sales deals were done in June and July utilizing information from the report and the Commercial Support and Financial Accounting groups are looking at the report for ways to employ it in their work Again I just wanted to pass along to you that your team was instrumental in the development of the report and I wanted to give them the appropriate recognition I thought Id better send this now as opposed to waiting for PEP lest I forget I also believe that good news shouldnt wait We dont always hear enough of it Thanks again Ken Powers
TW Daily Balance Please see attached report Note that Linepack numbers have not been updated due to server and connectivity problems Please call me if you have any questions Ken Powers

No Daily Balance Report Today Im experiencing technical problems today with the Daily Balancing Report I will work with IT to get this issue resolved I hope to have the report for you tomorrow Let me know if you have any questions

TW Daily Balance Please see attached I have added the Linepack change to the report as we discussed in our last meeting This information is in the last column column U on the report The cell calculates the change in linepack from the previous day Linepack readings are taken at the end of each gas day Please call me if you have any questions Ken Powers

TW Daily Balance ReportPlease see attached SUMMARYONLY version of TW Daily Balance Report I wanted to let you know that I have consulted the leading experts in the field and all of my son Matthews textbooks hes seven and arranged the letters of the alphabet in their proper order Whew The formula notations have been corrected to reflect this newworldorder I will forward to all of you explanations of the formulas this week Remember the farright columns RS and T are still being worked on Dont bet your house on them As always call me if you have any questions Thanks Ken Powers

Status Firm Contract Data RequestI have placed the contracted information we discussed in a file called TW Firm October XLS on SMARKETINGTWFLOW This file has all of the firm contracts including capacity release contracts contracted on or after October It includes the contracted points and the contracted volume at each point I decided to include the capacity release contracts thinking that their rates might show us the market value of the capacity over time I can easily remove this data if you dont think it will be helpful My next steps as I understand it are to extract commodity volume revenue and rate information from the invoiced data for these contracts and extract a sample of daily flow information from the scheduling system for these contracts for Sean to review Please take a look at this data and let me know if it meets your needs or if you need additional information Ill keep working Ken Powers
